headline: Eversource Recognized for Sixth Straight Year Among America’s Most JUST Companies by JUST Capital and CNBC
summary: HARTFORD, Conn. & BOSTON, February 03, 2025--As a testament to its unyielding commitment to customers, communities, employees and the environment, Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) is being celebrated as a national leader for corporate responsibility through its recognition on this year’s JUST 100 list as part of its 2025 rankings of America’s Most JUST Companies, according to JUST Capital and CNBC. In its sixth straight appearance in the top 100 performers, the energy company ranked as the number one
